title: I, Tarzan: Against All Odds
description: By age thirteen, I was an alcoholic — anything to numb myself from my world of emotional abuse. That wasn’t who I wanted to be. My dreams of adventure and exploration were so far out of reach. I’d never become Tarzan. I’d never become Jacques Cousteau.  But I was wrong. This is my story . . .  From the award-winning author of Dancing with Death comes an epic memoir that will delight fans of The Glass Castle, Wild, and Unbroken, as well as Educated and Can’t Hurt Me. The thrilling I, Tarzan is a deep journey into the author’s innermost secrets that will have you questioning your own self-understanding and life goals.
author: Jean-Philippe Soulé
